basics.name: Aqeel Raza
basics.label: Senior Backend Developer
basics.summary: Senior Node.js Developer with 6+ years of experience in building secure, scalable backend systems using Node.js, NestJS, TypeScript, and AWS. Experienced in microservices, serverless architectures, and cloud-native application development.

skills.name: Cloud & DevOps
keywords: AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, Cognito, CloudWatch, SES, SNS)

education.institution: Capital University of Science and Technology
education.area: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.summary: Led backend development for multiple government and enterprise applications.
highlights: Built EHR system compliant with DEA and SureScript using Node.js/NestJS.
Designed AWS infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines, speeding up deployments by 30%.
Migrated monolithic applications to microservices, reducing maintenance time by 40%.
Optimized performance for Kalba Municipality API, reducing latency by 35%.
Built low-latency APIs for recruitment platforms using Node.js.
Integrated PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and DynamoDB for hybrid data workflows.
Implemented AWS Lambda microservices to reduce infra costs by 25%.
Developed serverless backend features using AWS Lambda and API Gateway.
Implemented secure authentication with AWS Cognito.
Built SaaS applications using Node.js and Angular.
